contracts.name: Standard SME Service Agreement (India)
contracts.description: Balanced service agreement suitable for Indian SMEs

clauses.title: Parties
clauses.text: This Service Agreement is entered into between [Client Name], having its principal place of business at [Client Address] ("Client"), and [Service Provider Name], having its principal place of business at [Provider Address] ("Service Provider").

clauses.title: Scope of Services
clauses.text: Service Provider shall provide the services described in Schedule A ("Services") in a professional and workmanlike manner.

clauses.title: Fees and Payment
clauses.text: Client shall pay Service Provider the fees specified in Schedule B. Invoices shall be payable within [15] days of receipt. Late payments may attract interest not exceeding [1.5]% per month.

clauses.title: Term and Termination
clauses.text: This Agreement shall commence on [Start Date] and continue for [Initial Term]. Either party may terminate this Agreement by providing [30] days’ written notice. Breach termination shall include a cure period of [15] days.

clauses.title: Confidentiality
clauses.text: Each party shall maintain the confidentiality of the other party’s confidential information during the term of this Agreement and for [2] years thereafter.

clauses.title: Intellectual Property
clauses.text: Each party retains ownership of its background intellectual property. Deliverables created specifically for Client shall belong to Client upon full payment.

clauses.title: Limitation of Liability
clauses.text: The total liability of either party shall not exceed the fees paid in the [preceding 6 months]. Neither party shall be liable for indirect or consequential damages.

clauses.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
clauses.text: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India. Courts located in [City], India shall have exclusive jurisdiction.

clauses.title: Parties
clauses.text: This Vendor Agreement is entered into between [Buyer Name] and [Vendor Name].

clauses.title: Supply of Goods
clauses.text: Vendor shall supply the goods as specified in Schedule A in accordance with agreed specifications and timelines.

clauses.title: Pricing and Payment
clauses.text: Prices shall be as agreed in writing. Payments shall be made within [15] days of invoice receipt.

clauses.title: Inspection and Acceptance
clauses.text: Buyer shall have the right to inspect goods upon delivery. Rejected goods shall be replaced or refunded.

clauses.title: Termination
clauses.text: Either party may terminate this Agreement with [30] days’ written notice. Immediate termination is permitted for material breach subject to cure.

clauses.title: Indemnity
clauses.text: Each party shall indemnify the other against third-party claims arising from breach, negligence, or wilful misconduct, subject to a reasonable liability cap.

clauses.title: Governing Law
clauses.text: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India and courts of [City] shall have jurisdiction.
